title: who is pumped for them malz changes!?

embed.description: Vegathron / Gold 2 24LP / 64W 54L Win Ratio 54% / Malzahar - 41W 19L Win Ratio 68%, Vel'Koz - 8W 8L Win Ratio 50%, Janna - 5W 5L Win Ratio 50%, Caitlyn - 3W 7L Win Ratio 30%, Jhin - 4W 4L Win Ratio 50%

body:
cant wait to be able to actually burst again! the ult change is orgasmic! im already on 69% winrate on mid malz, challenger here i come! XD

its the good parts of the old kit with the depth and fun (E resets etc) of the new kit! thank you riot!


for anyone who doesnt know so far the changes are on his w e and r

W summons a minion that dies to a single auto/spell however casting other spells builds stacks (up to 2 extra for 3 total) so you can instantly summon 3. also i think the damage on them is down and they can NOT multiply.

e is going from 70% ap ratio to 80%

r is losing most of its % damage for flat damage and getting a nice scaling as well

old r at rank 3: 45% health damage + 7.5% per 100 ap

new r at rank 3: tether damage is 375 magic damage (+1.25 ap) null zone damage 20% hp damage + 2.5% per 100 ap

hype!

replies.body:
they are tentative changes for 7:10 patch (so they could be changed before they go to live but fingers crossed they dont!)

so whenever the next patch is!

Im phsyced for it

Bring back solo lane malz
inb4 hes perma ban and i cant play him. thatd be a sad twist XD
